title: Hoarfrost cannon
data:

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An elegant siege weapon, magically sculpted from crystalline ice. As ephemeral as a summer snowstorm, every salvo it fires consumes a portion of itself until nothing is left behind but water. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Hoarfrost cannons** are [stationary](/Stationary "Stationary") constructs that can fire projectiles at enemies. Each shot consumes a portion of their HP, and the 5th shot explodes in a 3x3 area that ignores allies and deals more damage. The projectiles deal [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage and inflict the [Frozen](/Frozen "Frozen") status.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Hoarfrost Bullet](/Hoarfrost_Bullet "Hoarfrost Bullet") (3d9) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), hoarfrost cannons will be added to the game as part of [Hoarfrost Cannonade](/Hoarfrost_Cannonade "Hoarfrost Cannonade").

An elegant siege weapon, magically sculpted from crystalline ice. As ephemeral as a summer snowstorm, every salvo it fires consumes a portion of itself until nothing is left behind but water.

  • 3 Tips & Tricks

Useful Info

Hoarfrost cannons are stationary constructs that can fire projectiles at enemies. Each shot consumes a portion of their HP, and the 5th shot explodes in a 3x3 area that ignores allies and deals more damage. The projectiles deal cold damage and inflict the Frozen status.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Hoarfrost Bullet (3d9) Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

History

  • In 0.32, hoarfrost cannons will be added to the game as part of Hoarfrost Cannonade.
